name: Protect The Tutorial Sign!
description:
You're a simple person (dwarf?) that just wants to go through tutorial and protect the tutorial sign. Build towers and other buildings to achieve that. The sign will tell you the rest.

The game takes some time to load for the first time.

Controls

  • WASD  or arrow keys - Movement.
  • Space - use/put
  • hold E or left Alt- swing hammer
  • Escape or Enter to open menu

Game made for #lospecjam1, finished after the jam.

Warning: try hardcore difficulty on your own risk
